## randNorm variable

Sets `v` to random vector, normalized to length `n` (default: 1). If no `rnd` instance is given, uses `SYSTEM`<!-- -->, i.e. `Math.random`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
randNorm: (v: Vec | null, n?: number, rnd?: IRandom) => Vec
```
